channel.title: Not 100% sure but
channel.description:
there was a topic on my site. and i didnt know what to think, they say its illegal to do exactly what moparscape is doing [quote="Rob, post:9, topic:554"]I was messing around with Runescapes site and came a cross this quote [quote][b]Intellectual property rights[/b] [b]Jagex® and RuneScape® are registered trade marks of Jagex Limited in the United Kingdom, the United States and other countries.
You must not reverse-engineer, decompile or modify the Game client software in any way. You must not use a modified/customised version of the client software. You must not create or provide any other means by which the Game may be played by others (including, without limitation, replacement or modified client/server software, server emulators).
Materials (including without limit all information, software, data, text, photographs, graphics, sound and video) placed on this website by us or on our behalf are protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights of ourselves or our business partners / suppliers / advertisers. You may not use these materials or this website except to play the Game in accordance with these terms and conditions and for personal (i.e. non-commercial) use only.[/b] [/quote]
To me that sounds like that they are illegal,
Last year i remember someone sending a message to Jagex and they said they were allowed. Surely moparscape would be gone by now? i dont know but please post your feedback[/quote]

item.title: Not 100% sure but
item.dc:creator: @h4xx0rz h4xx0rz
item.description:
@h4xx0rz wrote:

no way we’re illegal. we’re all members worshipping the magical car named the Mopar ;D /excuse

Read full topic

item.title: Not 100% sure but
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

The private server themselves are not illegal as they are original code(or at least, not jagex’s code). The client itself though could be illegal, but I wouldn’t worry about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Not 100% sure but
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

The only thing illegal to do is distribute the illegal client, but trust me, jagex staff were crawling the forums months within it’s creation. They can’t do shit.

Ohh yeah, their TOS and rules aren’t actually legally binding contracts, same as our TOS isn’t, they just want you to believe theirs is.

Read full topic

item.description:

mewparscape r illegal, obviously
but that doesnt stop us?
fkit.

item.description:
@Frell wrote:

there was a topic on my site. and i didnt know what to think, they say its illegal to do exactly what moparscape is doing

[quote=“Rob, post:9, topic:554”]I was messing around with Runescapes site and came a cross this quote

[quote]Intellectual property rights
[b]Jagex® and RuneScape® are registered trade marks of Jagex Limited in the United Kingdom, the United States and other countries.

You must not reverse-engineer, decompile or modify the Game client software in any way. You must not use a modified/customised version of the client software. You must not create or provide any other means by which the Game may be played by others (including, without limitation, replacement or modified client/server software, server emulators).

Materials (including without limit all information, software, data, text, photographs, graphics, sound and video) placed on this website by us or on our behalf are protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights of ourselves or our business partners / suppliers / advertisers. You may not use these materials or this website except to play the Game in accordance with these terms and conditions and for personal (i.e. non-commercial) use only.[/b]
[/quote]

To me that sounds like that they are illegal,

Last year i remember someone sending a message to Jagex and they said they were allowed. Surely moparscape would be gone by now? i dont know but please post your feedback[/quote]
